modelIdentification.name: AIS FOM module
modelIdentification.description: The AIS FOM module models the messages related AIS class A equipment.

interactionClass.name: AISRadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: This is the root interaction class for all AIS messages. The interaction class contains a reference to the embedded system that represents the AIS transmitter. The embedded system should be modelled as a RadioTransmitter, an RPR-FOM object class that is suclassed from Embedded System.

parameter.name: HostRadioIndex
parameter.semantics: Object instance ID of the embedded system host.

parameter.name: MessageID
parameter.semantics: Identifier for this message: AISPositionReportRadioSignal (1-3): 1 = Scheduled position report 2 = Assigned scheduled position report 3 = Special position report, response to interrogation AISStaticAndVoyageRadioSignal (5)

parameter.name: RepeatIndicator
parameter.semantics: Used by the repeater to indicate how many times a message has been repeated (0-3). 0 = default; 3 = do not repeat any more

parameter.name: MMSI
parameter.semantics: The vessel's Maritime Mobile Service Identity (MMSI); a unique nine digit identification number.

interactionClass.name: AISClassARadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: This is the root interaction class for all AIS Class A messages. This class contains no parameters.

interactionClass.name: AISPositionReportRadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: This interaction class models an AIS Class A Position Report.

parameter.name: NavigationalStatus
parameter.semantics: Navigational status: 0 = under way using engine, 1 = at anchor, 2 = not under command, 3 = restricted maneuverability, 4 = constrained by her draught, 5 = moored, 6 = aground, 7 = engaged in fishing, 8 = under way sailing, 9 = reserved for future amendment of navigational status for ships carrying DG, HS, or MP, or IMO hazard or pollutant category C, high speed craft (HSC), 10 = reserved for future amendment of navigational status for ships carrying dangerous goods (DG), harmful substances (HS) or marine pollutants (MP), or IMO hazard or pollutant category A, wing in grand (WIG); 11-13 = reserved for future use, 14 = AIS-SART (active), 15 = not defined = default (also used by AIS-SART under test).

parameter.name: RateOfTurn
parameter.semantics: Rate of turn: right (+) or left (-), degrees per minute.

parameter.name: SpeedOverGround
parameter.semantics: Speed over ground (knots).

parameter.name: PositionAccuracy
parameter.semantics: The position accuracy: 1 = high (<= 10 m) 0 = low (> 10 m) 0 = default

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Position (latitude, longitude, altitude) converted in the ECEF coordinates system.

parameter.name: CourseOverGround
parameter.semantics: Course over ground; relative to true north (0 to 360 degrees).

parameter.name: TrueHeading
parameter.semantics: True heading (0 to 360 degrees).

parameter.name: ReportTime
parameter.semantics: UTC second when the report was generated by the electronic position system (EPFS) (0-59, or 60 if time stamp is not available, which should also be the default value, or 61 if positioning system is in manual input mode, or 62 if electronic position fixing system operates in estimated (dead reckoning) mode, or 63 if the positioning system is inoperative)

parameter.name: SpecialManeuvreIndicator
parameter.semantics: Special Maneuvre Indicator: 0 = not available = default 1 = not engaged in special maneuver 2 = engaged in special maneuver

parameter.name: RAIMFlag
parameter.semantics: Receiver autonomous integrity monitoring (RAIM) flag of electronic position fixing device; 0 = RAIM not in use = default; 1 = RAIM in use.

interactionClass.name: AISStaticAndVoyageRadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: This interaction class models AIS Class A Static and Voyage data.

parameter.name: AISVersionIndicator
parameter.semantics: AIS version indicator: 0 = station compliant with Recommendation ITU-R M.1371-1 1 = station compliant with Recommendation ITU-R M.1371-3 2-3 = station compliant with future editions

parameter.name: IMO
parameter.semantics: IMO ship identification number; a seven digit number that remains unchanged upon transfer of the ship's registration to another country.

parameter.name: CallSign
parameter.semantics: Radio call sign; international radio call sign, up to seven characters, assigned to the vessel by its country of registry.

parameter.name: VesselName
parameter.semantics: Name ? 20 characters to represent the name of the vessel.

parameter.name: ShipType
parameter.semantics: Type of ship/cargo (0 .. 255).

parameter.name: DimensionToBow
parameter.semantics: From vessel position reference point to front of vessel (rounded to integer meters).

parameter.name: DimensionToStern
parameter.semantics: From vessel position reference point to back of vessel (rounded to integer meters).

parameter.name: DimensionToPort
parameter.semantics: From vessel position reference point to left side of vessel (rounded to integer meters).

parameter.name: DimensionToStarboard
parameter.semantics: From vessel position reference point to right side of vessel (rounded to integer meters).

parameter.name: ElectronicPositionFixingDevice
parameter.semantics: Type of electronic position fixing device: 0 = undefined (default) 1 = GPS 2 = GLONASS 3 = combined GPS/GLONASS 4 = Loran-C 5 = Chayka 6 = integrated navigation system 7 = surveyed 8 = Galileo, 9-15 = not used

parameter.name: ETA
parameter.semantics: Estimated time of arrival at destination.

parameter.name: Draught
parameter.semantics: Maximum present static draught.

parameter.name: Destination
parameter.semantics: Destination.

parameter.name: DataTerminalEquipment
parameter.semantics: Data terminal equipment (DTE) ready (0 = available, 1 = not available = default)
